content.html: 1/ I think the reason there’s such a large gendered difference in the perception of Elon Musk is because of life experiences. I think for white men, he’s a power fantasy of a world where your wildest ideas have unlimited resources but for women he represents something else.
content.value:
1/ I think the reason there’s such a large gendered difference in the perception of Elon Musk is because of life experiences. 

I think for white men, he’s a power fantasy of a world where your wildest ideas have unlimited resources 

but for women he represents something else.
